classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, C1, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, Area D Elective, Lower-Division E, and Lower-Division F. Upper-Division C should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, Unites States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C1, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, or E.

Any Life Science Support Elective course can go here.

Cannot double count units.

Select 4 units from the following "Life Science" Support Electives: BIO111, BIO161, BIO213 & BMED213; BOT121; MCRO221.

No double-counting is allowed between Additional Science Support Elective and Life Science SUpport Elective or Physical Science Support Elective.
Choose one of the following: MATH206, or MATH244.

Any Life Science Support Elective course can go here.

No double-counting is allowed between Additional Science Support Elective and Life Science SUpport Elective or Physical Science Support Elective.
Choose one of the following: PHIL230, or PHIL231.
Choose one of the following: CSC300, or PHIL323.

Choose one of the following: CSC321, CSC323, or CSC325.

classes.cCustomCardDisplayName: GPU/Systems Track Course or Art Track Course
classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: GPU/Systems Track course, or Art Track course. Cannot double count units. Students must select the GPU/Systems Track (8 units) or Art Track (8 units). GPU/Systems Track (8 units): Select 4 units from the following: CSC473, CSC474, CSC572; CSC476. Select 4 units from the Technical Electives Guidelines in the online catalog. Art Track (8 units): Select 4 units from the following "Art Electives": CSC350 & CSC450; ART376, ART384. Select 4 units from the following "Applied Electives": CSC371, CSC377, CSC378.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, C1, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, Area D Elective, Lower-Division E, and Lower-Division F. Upper-Division C should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, Unites States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C1, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, or E.

classes.cCustomCardDisplayName: Technical Elective or Art Track Course
classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: Technical Elective, or Art Track course. Cannot double count units. If CPE464 is taken in the major, CPE469 should be taken as a Technical Elective in the Graphics Concentration. Students must select the GPU/Systems Track (8 units) or Art Track (8 units). GPU/Systems Track (8 units): Select 4 units from the following: CSC473, CSC474, CSC572; CSC476. Select 4 units from the Technical Electives Guidelines in the online catalog. Art Track (8 units): Select 4 units from the following "Art Electives": CSC350 & CSC450; ART376, ART384. Select 4 units from the following "Applied Electives": CSC371, CSC377, CSC378.
